tool.name: utils.merge_dicts
tool.description: Given any number of dicts, shallow copy and merge into a new dict,
tool.help:
Given any number of dicts, shallow copy and merge into a new dict, precedence goes to key value pairs in latter dicts.
Notes ----- http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38987/how-to-merge-two-python-dictionaries-in-a-single-expression
